messages.title: 3 Reasons to Vote Liberal Democrat
messages.content: Fairness in Politics, Fairness in Reducing tax + Fairness in Education

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will NOT take a second home on expenses.
Change the income tax free allowance to £10,000, giving you back up to £700 per year.
Reduce some class sizes to just 15 giving our children a fair start in life.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It will be VERY close between the Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives here! Every vote counts and voting for the Liberal Democrats will send a powerful message.

issues.governance: I will NOT take a second home on expenses.
issues.economy: Change the income tax free allowance to £10,000, giving you back up to £700 per year.
issues.education: Reduce some class sizes to just 15 giving our children a fair start in life.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats have strong green credentials pledging to insulate millions of homes and make Britain Carbon neutral by 2050.

housing.content: I will NOT take a second home on expenses.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RSBK-KJGZ-AZXR 30 St. John's Road Tunbridge Wells Kent TN4 9XE

images.caption: WANTED AS CHANCELLOR Vince Cable LIB DEM

leaflet.additionalNotes: We have a real chance of getting Vince Cable as Chancellor if you vote Lib Dem!
